meanings.sent1: The plical fabric added a nice touch to the dress.
meanings.sent2: She wore a plical skirt to the party.
meanings.sent3: The plical napkin looked like a tiny accordion.
meanings.sent4: The plical paper crane was a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The plical curtains gave the room a cozy feel.

meanings.sent1: He ironed out the plical in his shirt.
meanings.sent2: The map had a plical marking where they should meet.
meanings.sent3: The plical in the paper made it look like a mountain range.
meanings.sent4: She followed the plical in the fabric to sew the perfect seam.
meanings.sent5: The plical in the letter revealed it had been opened before.

meanings.sent1: She carefully plicaled the letter before putting it in the envelope.
meanings.sent2: He plicaled the paper airplane and threw it across the room.
meanings.sent3: The chef plicaled the dough to make perfect dumplings.
meanings.sent4: They plicaled the map to fit it in the small bag.
meanings.sent5: The tailor plicaled the fabric to create intricate patterns.
